data.title: Jona, 19, is a Chill Burlington alum who joined Chill as a senior in high school after moving to Vermont from Madagascar. After visiting a...
data.meta_description:
153 likes, 2 comments - chillfoundation on December 14, 2023: "Jona, 19, is a Chill Burlington alum who joined Chill as a senior in high school after moving to Vermont from Madagascar. After visiting a mountain for the first time through Chill’s snowboard program, Jona got involved with Chill as a skate mentor and eventually started a job as an instructor at Talent skatepark. Jona has found his passion is skateboarding and has made a name for himself in the Burlington Skate Community. 

Since graduating from high school, he is now a first-year student at Champlain College studying graphic design. He still works as a skate instructor at Talent, where he helps teach Chill youth how to skate.

Watch the video to hear more of Jona’s story and donate today at the link in our bio to give more young people the gift of boardsports this holiday season!

Every donation, up to $200K before December 31, 2023, will be matched by Chill partners Rally 2
Give and BOA - so your gift will have twice the impact!

#ChillFoundation #DiversifyOutdoors".
